an3.93:3.2.pli: Sākabhakkhāpi honti, sāmākabhakkhāpi honti, nīvārabhakkhāpi honti, daddulabhakkhāpi honti, haṭabhakkhāpi honti, kaṇabhakkhāpi honti, ācāmabhakkhāpi honti, piññākabhakkhāpi honti, tiṇabhakkhāpi honti, gomayabhakkhāpi honti, vanamūlaphalāhārā yāpenti pavattaphalabhojī.
an3.93:3.2.de: Sie essen Kräuter, Hirse, wilden Reis, mageren Reis, Wasserlattich, Reiskleie, Schaum von gekochtem Reis, Sesammehl, Gras oder Kuhmist. Sie überleben mit Wurzeln und Waldbeeren oder essen herabgefallene Früchte.
an3.93:3.2.en: They eat herbs, millet, wild rice, poor rice, water lettuce, rice bran, scum from boiling rice, sesame flour, grass, or cow dung. They survive on forest roots and fruits, or eating fallen fruit.

an3.156:3.1.pli: So sākabhakkhopi hoti, sāmākabhakkhopi hoti, nīvārabhakkhopi hoti, daddulabhakkhopi hoti, haṭabhakkhopi hoti, kaṇabhakkhopi hoti, ācāmabhakkhopi hoti, piññākabhakkhopi hoti, tiṇabhakkhopi hoti, gomayabhakkhopi hoti, vanamūlaphalāhāro yāpeti pavattaphalabhojī.
an3.156:3.1.de: Er isst Kräuter, Hirse, wilden Reis, mageren Reis, Wasserlattich, Reiskleie, Schaum von gekochtem Reis, Sesammehl, Gras oder Kuhmist. Er überlebt mit Wurzeln und Waldbeeren oder isst herabgefallene Früchte.
an3.156:3.1.en: They eat herbs, millet, wild rice, poor rice, water lettuce, rice bran, scum from boiling rice, sesame flour, grass, or cow dung. They survive on forest roots and fruits, or eating fallen fruit.

an4.198:3.1.de: Er isst Kräuter, Hirse, wilden Reis, mageren Reis, Wasserlattich, Reiskleie, Schaum von gekochtem Reis, Sesammehl, Gras oder Kuhmist. Er überlebt mit Wurzeln und Waldbeeren oder isst herabgefallene Früchte.
an4.198:3.1.en: They eat herbs, millet, wild rice, poor rice, water lettuce, rice bran, scum from boiling rice, sesame flour, grass, or cow dung. They survive on forest roots and fruits, or eating fallen fruit.

mn51:8.6.pli: So sākabhakkho vā hoti, sāmākabhakkho vā hoti, nīvārabhakkho vā hoti, daddulabhakkho vā hoti, haṭabhakkho vā hoti, kaṇabhakkho vā hoti, ācāmabhakkho vā hoti, piññākabhakkho vā hoti, tiṇabhakkho vā hoti, gomayabhakkho vā hoti; vanamūlaphalāhāro yāpeti pavattaphalabhojī.

dn25:8.8.pli: So sākabhakkho vā hoti, sāmākabhakkho vā hoti, nīvārabhakkho vā hoti, daddulabhakkho vā hoti, haṭabhakkho vā hoti, kaṇabhakkho vā hoti, ācāmabhakkho vā hoti, piññākabhakkho vā hoti, tiṇabhakkho vā hoti, gomayabhakkho vā hoti; vanamūlaphalāhāro yāpeti pavattaphalabhojī.
dn25:8.8.de: Er isst Kräuter, Hirse, wilden Reis, mageren Reis, Wasserlattich, Reiskleie, Schaum von gekochtem Reis, Sesammehl, Gras oder Kuhmist. Er überlebt mit Wurzeln und Waldbeeren oder isst herabgefallene Früchte.
dn25:8.8.en: They eat herbs, millet, wild rice, poor rice, water lettuce, rice bran, scum from boiling rice, sesame flour, grass, or cow dung. They survive on forest roots and fruits, or eating fallen fruit.

mlDocs.title:
Lange Lehrreden 25
Das Löwengebrüll im Kloster der Dame Udumbarikā

mn12:45.6.pli: So sākabhakkho vā homi, sāmākabhakkho vā homi, nīvārabhakkho vā homi, daddulabhakkho vā homi, haṭabhakkho vā homi, kaṇabhakkho vā homi, ācāmabhakkho vā homi, piññākabhakkho vā homi, tiṇabhakkho vā homi, gomayabhakkho vā homi, vanamūlaphalāhāro yāpemi pavattaphalabhojī.
mn12:45.6.de: Ich aß Kräuter, Hirse, wilden Reis, mageren Reis, Wasserlattich, Reiskleie, Schaum von gekochtem Reis, Sesammehl, Gras oder Kuhmist. Ich überlebte mit Wurzeln und Waldbeeren oder aß herabgefallene Früchte.
mn12:45.6.en: I ate herbs, millet, wild rice, poor rice, water lettuce, rice bran, scum from boiling rice, sesame flour, grass, or cow dung. I survived on forest roots and fruits, or eating fallen fruit.
